description:
FREE & POWERFUL way to browse almost all available apps for webOS:

Tired of App-Spam? Can't "separate the wheat from the chaff" in the AppCatalog? Try this one. 
It's for sure the most productive way to access the AppCatalog on your device:

* custom searches
* filter and order by ratings, comments or price
* order by number of downloads
* access Beta and Web apps
* see numbers of all apps, new apps, updated apps and apps on sale
* instant search
* Just Typ support

PLUS you can exclude certain developers or words in the description from your result list.

Update:
* share number of apps on sale
versionNote: * share number of apps on sale
